contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED, the Order of the Superior Court is REVERSED, and the matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court for disposition on the merits. See Estate of Janosky, 827 A.2d 512 (Pa.Super.2003); Estate of Luongo, 823 A.2d 942 (Pa.Super.2003); Pa.R.A.P. 311; as amended June 29, 2005. Jurisdiction relinquished.
